comment: Nice nose, flavors and finish.  Rich but still well balanced.  Some nice dark fruit and spices on the nose with a baking spices and a hint of malty sweetness on the tongue.  Smooth and clean finish.  A few drops of water do open up the nose, but nothing surprises. Very nice!

Flight - 4 of 4
From yesterday
Seattle, Wa
Too hot for my taste. After the heat calms down, some of the flavors emerge. But, the heat up front and it lingers, does not make this enjoyable.
